description: END unit townhouse in popular Woodside Village on Port Moody's North Shore. This family friendly home features over 1000 sqft with 3 beds and full bath upstairs, plus a second full bath on the main. Kitchen with stainless appliances. Easy care parquet and tile floors. Spacious living area with direct access to the private fenced patio/yard complete with storage shed. Easy access to Newport Village, transit and WC Express station. Two allocated parking stalls.
